data.lyric:
[ti:Let Me Go]
[ar:Hailee Steinfeld/Alesso/Florida Georgia Line/Watt]
[al:Let Me Go]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Let Me Go - Hailee Steinfeld (海莉·斯坦菲尔德)/Alesso (艾利索)/Florida Georgia Line/WATT
[00:01.04]Lyrics by：Andrew Wotman/Alexandra Tamposi/Brian Lee/Jamie Lidell/Alessandro Linbald
[00:02.09]Composed by：Andrew Wotman/Alexandra Tamposi/Brian Lee/Jamie Lidell/Alessandro Linbald
[00:03.14]Hailee Steinfeld：
[00:03.90]
[00:05.24]You made plans and I I made problems
[00:09.23]We were sleeping back to back
[00:11.69]We know this thing wasn't built to last
[00:14.29]Good on paper picture perfect
[00:18.61]Chased the high too far too fast
[00:20.96]Picket white fence but we paint it black
[00:23.34]Ooh and I wished you had hurt me harder than I hurt you
[00:28.06]Ooh and I wish you would have waited for me but you always do
[00:32.88]I've been hoping somebody loves you in the ways I couldn't
[00:39.43]
[00:39.96]Somebody's taking care of all of the mess I've made
[00:44.84]Someone you don't have to change
[00:46.81]I've been hoping
[00:49.29]Someone will love you let me go
[00:51.72]
[00:58.75]Someone will love you let me go
[01:01.18]
[01:05.56]I've been hoping
[01:07.97]Someone will love you let me go
[01:10.48]Florida Georgia Line：
[01:11.08]It's been some time but this time ain't even
[01:14.57]I can leave it in the past but you're holding on to
[01:17.71]What you never had
[01:19.00]It's good on paper picture perfect
[01:23.99]Chased the high too far too fast
[01:26.19]Picket white fence but we paint it black
[01:28.59]Hailee Steinfeld：
[01:29.72]Ooh and I wished you had hurt me harder than I hurt you
[01:33.25]Ooh and I wish you would have waited for me but you always do
[01:38.00]I've been hoping somebody loves you in the ways I couldn't
[01:45.12]Somebody's taking care of all of the mess I've made
[01:50.03]Someone you don't have to change
[01:52.14]I've been hoping
[01:54.58]Someone will love you let me go
[01:57.23]
[02:03.97]Someone will love you let me go
[02:06.49]
[02:10.85]I've been hoping
[02:13.26]Someone will love you let me go go go
[02:18.07]Someone will love you let me go go go
[02:22.70]Someone will love you let me go go go
[02:27.48]Someone will love you let me go go go
[02:32.13]Someone will love you let me go
[02:34.80]I've been hoping somebody loves you in the ways I couldn't
[02:40.97]Somebody's taking care of all of the mess I've made
[02:45.77]Someone you don't have to change
[02:47.94]I've been hoping
[02:50.47]Someone will love you let me go
data.trans:
[ti:Let Me Go]
[ar:Hailee Steinfeld/Alesso/Florida Georgia Line/Watt]
[al:Let Me Go]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:01.04]//
[00:02.09]//
[00:03.14]//
[00:03.90]
[00:05.24]你未雨绸缪 我随遇而安
[00:09.23]我们南辕北辙 同床异梦
[00:11.69]我知道这样的生活不会维持太久
[00:14.29]小说的情节现实中不会常有
[00:18.61]总想平步青云 一步登天
[00:20.96]但世事难料 总是事与愿违
[00:23.34]用伤害回报伤害 我希望你最后胜出
[00:28.06]我不断挑战你的底线 你却总是等我回头 
[00:32.88]我希望有人可以用我所不能的方式去爱你
[00:39.43]
[00:39.96]希望有人可以弥补我带给你的伤害
[00:44.84]可以让你不必做出牺牲与改变
[00:46.81]我希望
[00:49.29]我离开后 有人可以代替我去爱你
[00:51.72]
[00:58.75]我离开后 有人可以代替我去爱你
[01:01.18]
[01:05.56]我希望
[01:07.97]我离开后 有人可以代替我去爱你
[01:10.48]//
[01:11.08]说起来曾有一段时间
[01:14.57]我可以抛开过往 但你却不肯放手
[01:17.71]你从没做过这样的事
[01:19.00]小说的情节现实中不会常有
[01:23.99]总想平步青云 一步登天
[01:26.19]但世事难料 总是事与愿违
[01:28.59]//
[01:29.72]用伤害回报伤害 我希望你最后胜出
[01:33.25]我不断挑战你的底线 你却总是等我回头 
[01:38.00]我希望有人可以用我所不能的方式去爱你
[01:45.12]希望有人可以弥补我带给你的伤害
[01:50.03]可以让你不必做出牺牲与改变
[01:52.14]我希望
[01:54.58]我离开后 有人可以代替我去爱你
[01:57.23]
[02:03.97]我离开后 有人可以代替我去爱你
[02:06.49]
[02:10.85]我希望
[02:13.26]我离开后 有人可以代替我去爱你 
[02:18.07]我离开后 有人可以代替我去爱你 
[02:22.70]我离开后 有人可以代替我去爱你 
[02:27.48]我离开后 有人可以代替我去爱你 
[02:32.13]我离开后 有人可以代替我去爱你
[02:34.80]我希望有人可以用我所不能的方式去爱你
[02:40.97]希望有人可以弥补我带给你的伤害
[02:45.77]可以让你不必做出牺牲与改变
[02:47.94]我希望
[02:50.47]我离开后 有人可以代替我去爱你
